channel.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
channel.description: Okay I Am More Of A PI Guy Sooo I Need Help With This Delta Lol, Where Do I Edit The Quest Tab? Can You Help Me What The Quest Tab Says And When You Click On What It Says It Does A Action. Can Someone Help? Please And Thank You. I Know TextHandler.java And ClickingMost.java Are The Files To Edit.. But... This IS What I Want My Quest Tab To Look Like. [code]Players Online: 56 Staff Status: Owner Donor Status: Donor Pk Points: 158 - - - - - - - - - - - - Help (Want To Click It And It Opens The Help Tab) Rules (Want To Click It And It Opens The Rules Tab) Donate (Want To Click It And It Opens The Donate Link) Commands (Want To Click It And It Opens The Commands Tab) Information (Want To Click It And It Opens The Information Tab) [/code] Please And Thank You. :)

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay I Am More Of A PI Guy Sooo I Need Help With This Delta Lol, Where Do I Edit The Quest Tab?
Can You Help Me What The Quest Tab Says And When You Click On What It Says It Does A Action. Can Someone Help?
Please And Thank You.
I Know TextHandler.java And ClickingMost.java Are The Files To Edit… But… This IS What I Want My Quest Tab To Look Like.

[code]Players Online: 56
Staff Status: Owner
Donor Status: Donor
Pk Points: 158

Help (Want To Click It And It Opens The Help Tab)
Rules (Want To Click It And It Opens The Rules Tab)
Donate (Want To Click It And It Opens The Donate Link)
Commands (Want To Click It And It Opens The Commands Tab)
Information (Want To Click It And It Opens The Information Tab)
[/code] Please And Thank You.

Read full topic
